metadata.titel_preek: Trinity Sunday & Second Sunday After Pentecost

locutie.beschrijving: The sermon explains the Trinitarian nature of God as self-giving love and the depth of human sin (Psalm 130) as a 'primordial catastrophe' requiring divine mercy.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High. Strong focus on the historical context of Paul's letters and the liturgical history of the Book of Common Prayer.

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily asserting theological truths and explaining biblical metaphors, with occasional shifts into blessing and invitation.
voorbeelden: The inmost being of God is a dynamic interrelatedness.
This is no dry scholarly doctrine.
The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ... be with you all.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: The hearer should feel comforted by God's love and honest about their own sinfulness.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Moderate. The Spirit is mentioned as a member of the Trinity, but the Spirit's current work in the preaching event is not explicitly invoked.

voorbeelden: God’s love spends itself to the very last drop.
The Corinthian church has gone completely off the rails.
There is no human being who can come up with enough credits.
He shall redeem Israel from all his iniquities.
The God who pursues us even beyond the grave.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Weak. Promises are mostly quoted as scripture (3rd person) rather than spoken directly by the preacher to the congregation (2nd person).

voorbeelden: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ... be with you all.
I may leave you today with renewed confidence.
declaratieven.autoriteit: Moderate. The preacher uses the apostolic blessing to perform a reality-change, but the body of the sermon remains largely descriptive.

indicatoren: Extensive talk about the history of the Prayer Book.
Describing Paul's feelings rather than enacting Paul's authority.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer becomes an observer of a theological lecture rather than a participant in a divine encounter.

missende_elementen: Direct promise of grace to the 'you' in the pews

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: The toezegging is mostly found in the liturgical frame (the blessing) rather than the homiletical core.
voorbeelden: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ... be with you all.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Used to include the preacher in the 'we' of the church and the liturgy.

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Used primarily in the 'Imagine' and 'Think' exercises (Directives).

derde_persoon.gebruik: Dominant mode. Talking about Paul, the Corinthians, the Psalmist, and God.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a historical and dogmatic distance.

actueel_present.gebruik: The blessing and the 'now' of worship.

foutief_patroon.beschrijving: The sermon does not fall into heavy moralism (Directive-heavy).

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Moves from the depth of sin (Assertive) to the blessing of the Trinity (Declarative).
voorbeelden: Confession leading to the apostolic blessing.
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: The transition is present but the Declarative is brief compared to the Assertive explanation.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: Because there is forgiveness (Indicative), you shall be feared (Imperative/Response).

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon is an excellent theological essay that explains the Trinity and Sin, but it remains largely in the realm of 'talking about' these realities rather than 'bestowing' them.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The parent of a self-destructing child.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The removal of this line has robbed us of a powerful buttress...
zwakke_punten.probleem: Liturgical history takes precedence over the immediate proclamation of grace.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It informs the mind well, but the 'event' is deferred to the liturgical blessing at the end.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The preacher acts as a teacher/commentator more than a mandatory of the living Word.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: Implicitly through the text, but the preacher speaks 'about' God more than God speaks 'through' the preacher.
tekstueel_bewijs: I may leave you today... invoking... the apostolic blessing.

pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: The preacher asks God to 'grant' the effect in the prayer, acknowledging the Spirit's role in the perlocution.
tekstueel_bewijs: May God grant that not a single one of us...

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: The sermon treats the Word as a source of knowledge about grace.
tekstueel_bewijs: This is the movement of Psalm 130, widely acknowledged to be...

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: Too many 'is' and 'was' verbs; too few 'I promise' or 'God declares' verbs.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: God’s love spends itself to the very last drop.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Today, God spends His love on you, to the very last drop of His Son's blood.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Shifts from a general truth to a personal commissive act.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is quoted from the Psalm rather than applied to the congregation.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Turn the 3rd person 'He shall redeem' into a 2nd person 'He redeems you'.
voorbeeldzinnen: Hear the good news: He redeems you from all your iniquities.

adressering_verbetering.probleem: Too much time spent on 'the psalmist' and 'Paul'.
adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Use 'You' more frequently in the theological sections.
voorbeeldzinnen: You are the one out of the depths; you are the one God pursues.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The balance is actually quite good; the indicative is strong.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Ensure the indicative is performative, not just constative.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: The sermon is theologically rich and beautifully written. To move from a 'lecture' to an 'event,' focus on turning descriptions of God's love into direct promises of that love to the hearer.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SAT identifies that the preacher isn't just sending a 'message' about God, but performing a 'deed' of God (Declarative).
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: The focus is not on the persuasiveness of the parent-child metaphor, but on the illocutionary force of the blessing.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that the sermon's 'Constative Surplus' regarding Prayer Book history distracts from its 'Performative' potential.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ... be with you all.
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: The most performative moment of the text.

appendices.notities: The sermon is highly literary and intellectually stimulating, but the performative 'event' is concentrated almost entirely in the liturgical framing.
